    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BSTree<E>
     
    BSTreeADT<E>
    The BSTreeADT interface is designed to be used as a basis for the BST data structure that will be developed in the CPRG 304 class at SAIT.
    BSTreeNode<E>
    BSTreeNode represents a single node in a Binary Search Tree
    BSTreeTest
     
    CommandLineTest
    Comprehensive test of WordTracker command line interface Tests all required formats and functionality author: annie
    CumulativeRepositoryDemo
    Demonstration program showing cumulative repository behavior Simulates multiple WordTracker runs with different files
    Iterator<E>
    This interface will provide an mono-directional iterator for any of the data structures that are specified in this package.
    SerializationTest
    Test program specifically for serialization functionality author: annie
    TestWordTracker
    Simple test program to verify WordTracker components work author: annie
    Word
    Word class to store word information including files and line numbers where the word appears, and frequency of occurrence
    Word
     
    WordTracker
    WordTracker application that reads text files, tracks word occurrences, and generates reports using a Binary Search Tree data structure.
